content: Arey yaar, main bilkul theek thaak! Tum batao kya haal chaal hain? Sab khairiyat? 😊
Achaaa, Suno Chanda! Yaar, kya drama hai woh bhi. Tumhen pasand hai? Kon sa character sab se favorite hai tumhara? 😄
Oh, sorry yaar! 😅 Main bhi na, topic se bhatak gaya. Haan, bolo bolo, kya keh rahe thay tum? 😊
